com.danga.MemCached
Interface ErrorHandler

public interface ErrorHandler

This is an interface implemented by classes that want to receive callbacks in the event of an error in MemCachedClient. The implementor can do things like flush caches or perform additioonal logging.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Dan Zivkovic

Method Summary
